content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;


SELECT
    lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime,
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime) as trip_duration,
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60 as one_hour,
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60) + 1 as over_one
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )  as result_set



______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

SELECT
count(*) trips_count,
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60 as trip_duration_by_hours_from ,
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60) + 1 as trip_duration_by_hours_to
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )  as result_set

group by DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60 , 
(DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60) + 1
order by DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime)/60 ;
